fb.datatype
Class ARRAY

java.lang.Object
  fb.datatype.ANY
      fb.datatype.ARRAY

public class ARRAY
extends ANY

This class implements arrays as defined in IEC 61499-1

parseFrom

public int parseFrom(java.lang.String s,
                     int start)
              throws FBDataTypeException
Parses the receiver's content from the given String, beginning at the start position, which must contain a left bracket. The number of items in the initialization may be less than or equal to the length of the ARRAY.

Overrides:
parseFrom in class ANY
Parameters:
s - The String from which to parse the content.
start - The character position from which to begin parsing.
Returns:
The next character position beyond the terminating right bracket.
Throws:
FBDataTypeException - INVALID_OBJECT - The field had invalid syntax or no terminator was found.
See Also:
ANY.NULL_OBJECT, FBDataTypeException.invalidObject(String)

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a String representing the value as a bracketed list of element values.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
e.g., "[1,2,3]"
